article_title: Donations help Yuma police get new K-9 officer
article_text:
Thank you for reading 5 free articles on our site. og.description: Thanks to the generosity of the community, the Yuma Police Department has a new canine officer, who has already taken a bite out of crime in the short time he has been on the force.
